Paul<S>3972</S>, a prisoner<S>1198</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> Timothy<S>5095</S> our brother<S>80</S>, unto Philemon<S>5371</S> our<S>2257</S> dearly beloved<S>27</S>, and<S>2532</S> fellowlabourer<S>4904</S>,
And<S>2532</S> to our beloved<S>27</S> Apphia<S>682</S>, and<S>2532</S> Archippus<S>751</S> our<S>2257</S> fellowsoldier<S>4961</S>, and<S>2532</S> to the church<S>1577</S> in<S>2596</S> thy<S>4675</S> house<S>3624</S>:
Grace<S>5485</S> to you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> peace<S>1515</S>, from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
I thank<S>2168</S> my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, making<S>4160</S> mention<S>3417</S> of thee<S>4675</S> always<S>3842</S> in<S>1909</S> my<S>3450</S> prayers<S>4335</S>,
Hearing<S>191</S> of thy<S>4675</S> love<S>26</S> and<S>2532</S> faith<S>4102</S>, which<S>3739</S> thou hast<S>2192</S> toward<S>4314</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> toward<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> saints<S>40</S>;
That<S>3704</S> the communication<S>2842</S> of thy<S>4675</S> faith<S>4102</S> may become<S>1096</S> effectual<S>1756</S> by<S>1722</S> the acknowledging<S>1922</S> of every<S>3956</S> good thing<S>18</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> in<S>1519</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
For<S>1063</S> we have<S>2192</S> great<S>4183</S> joy<S>5485</S> and<S>2532</S> consolation<S>3874</S> in<S>1909</S> thy<S>4675</S> love<S>26</S>, because<S>3754</S> the bowels<S>4698</S> of the saints<S>40</S> are refreshed<S>373</S> by<S>1223</S> thee<S>4675</S>, brother<S>80</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S>, though I might be<S>2192</S> much<S>4183</S> bold<S>3954</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> to enjoin<S>2004</S> thee<S>4671</S> that which is convenient<S>433</S>,
Yet for<S>1223</S> love's<S>26</S> sake I<S>3870</S> rather<S>3123</S> beseech<S>3870</S> thee, being<S>5607</S> such an one<S>5108</S> as<S>5613</S> Paul<S>3972</S> the aged<S>4246</S>, and<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> also<S>2532</S> a prisoner<S>1198</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
I beseech<S>3870</S> thee<S>4571</S> for<S>4012</S> my<S>1699</S> son<S>5043</S> Onesimus<S>3682</S>, whom<S>3739</S> I have begotten<S>1080</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> bonds<S>1199</S>:
Which<S>3588</S> in time past<S>4218</S> was<S>890</S> to thee<S>4671</S> unprofitable<S>890</S>, but<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> profitable<S>2173</S> to thee<S>4671</S> and<S>2532</S> to me<S>1698</S>:
Whom<S>3739</S> I have sent again<S>375</S>: thou<S>4771</S> therefore<S>1161</S> receive<S>4355</S> him<S>846</S>, that is<S>5123</S>, mine own<S>1699</S> bowels<S>4698</S>:
Whom<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> would<S>1014</S> have retained<S>2722</S> with<S>4314</S> me<S>1683</S>, that<S>2443</S> in thy<S>4675</S> stead<S>5228</S> he might have ministered<S>1247</S> unto me<S>3427</S> in<S>1722</S> the bonds<S>1199</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S>:
But<S>1161</S> without<S>5565</S> thy<S>4674</S> mind<S>1106</S> would<S>2309</S> I do<S>4160</S> nothing<S>3762</S>; that<S>3363</S> thy<S>4675</S> benefit<S>18</S> should<S>5600</S> not<S>3363</S> be<S>5600</S> as<S>5613</S> it were of<S>2596</S> necessity<S>318</S>, but<S>235</S> willingly<S>1595</S> <S>2596</S>.
For<S>1063</S> <S>1223</S> perhaps<S>5029</S> he<S>5563</S> therefore<S>5124</S> departed<S>5563</S> for<S>4314</S> a season<S>5610</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou shouldest receive<S>568</S> him<S>846</S> for ever<S>166</S>;
Not now<S>3765</S> as<S>5613</S> a servant<S>1401</S>, but<S>235</S> above<S>5228</S> a servant<S>1401</S>, a brother<S>80</S> beloved<S>27</S>, specially<S>3122</S> to me<S>1698</S>, but<S>1161</S> how much<S>4214</S> more<S>3123</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, both<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>?
If<S>1487</S> thou count<S>2192</S> me<S>1691</S> therefore<S>3767</S> a partner<S>2844</S>, receive<S>4355</S> him<S>846</S> as<S>5613</S> myself<S>1691</S>.
If<S>1161</S> <S>1487</S> he hath wronged<S>91</S> thee<S>4571</S>, or<S>2228</S> oweth<S>3784</S> thee ought<S>5100</S>, put<S>1677</S> that<S>5124</S> on<S>1677</S> mine account<S>1698</S>;
I<S>1473</S> Paul<S>3972</S> have written<S>1125</S> it with mine own<S>1699</S> hand<S>5495</S>, I<S>1473</S> will repay<S>661</S> it: albeit<S>3363</S> I do<S>3004</S> not<S>3363</S> say<S>3004</S> to thee<S>4671</S> how<S>3754</S> thou owest<S>4359</S> unto me<S>3427</S> even<S>2532</S> thine own self<S>4572</S> besides<S>4359</S>.
Yea<S>3483</S>, brother<S>80</S>, let<S>3685</S> me<S>1473</S> have joy<S>3685</S> of thee<S>4675</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>: refresh<S>373</S> my<S>3450</S> bowels<S>4698</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Having confidence<S>3982</S> in thy<S>4675</S> obedience<S>5218</S> I wrote<S>1125</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> thou wilt<S>4160</S> also<S>2532</S> do<S>4160</S> more than<S>3739</S> <S>5228</S> I say<S>3004</S>.
But<S>1161</S> withal<S>260</S> prepare<S>2090</S> me<S>3427</S> also<S>2532</S> a lodging<S>3578</S>: for<S>1063</S> I trust<S>1679</S> that<S>3754</S> through<S>1223</S> your<S>5216</S> prayers<S>4335</S> I shall be given<S>5483</S> unto you<S>5213</S>.
There salute<S>782</S> thee<S>4571</S> Epaphras<S>1889</S>, my<S>3450</S> fellowprisoner<S>4869</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>;
Marcus<S>3138</S>, Aristarchus<S>708</S>, Demas<S>1214</S>, Lucas<S>3065</S>, my<S>3450</S> fellowlabourers<S>4904</S>.
The grace<S>5485</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be with<S>3326</S> your<S>5216</S> spirit<S>4151</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>Written<S>1125</S> from<S>575</S> Rome<S>4516</S> to<S>4314</S> Philemon<S>5371</S>, by<S>1223</S> Onesimus<S>3682</S> a servant<S>3610</S>.</sup>
